options.name: option
options.description: The option to edit.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value for the option. Leave blank to reset to default.

premiumOnly: This option is only used in premium servers.
For more information, please see the `/premium info` command.

autocomplete.invalid: Invalid option provided. Please go back and fix it.

config guilds view.name: view
config guilds view.description: View the guilds linked to this server.

config guilds add-guild.name: add-guild
config guilds add-guild.description: Add a Hypixel guild to this server.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to add.

addedGuild: The guild **{guild}** has been added to this server!

config guilds remove-guild.name: remove-guild
config guilds remove-guild.description: Remove a Hypixel guild from this server.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to remove.

removedGuild: The guild **{guild}** has been removed from this server!

config guilds add-rank.name: add-rank
config guilds add-rank.description: Links a Hypixel guild rank to a Discord role.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to link.

options.name: role
options.description: The role to link to the rank.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The rank **{rank}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.
addedRank: The rank **{rank}** in guild **{guild}** has been linked to {role.mention}!

config guilds remove-rank.name: remove-rank
config guilds remove-rank.description: Unlinks a Hypixel guild rank from a Discord role.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to remove.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRank: The rank **{rank}** in guild **{guild}** has been unlinked.

config guilds add-requirement.name: add-requirement
config guilds add-requirement.description: Adds a requirement to a Hypixel guild.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to add the requirement to.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to add.

options.name: value
options.description: The value of the requirement. Input any number for the 'API Settings Enabled' requirement.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
requirementNotFound: The requirement **{requirement}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.
addedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been added to **{guild}**!

config guilds remove-requirement.name: remove-requirement
config guilds remove-requirement.description: Removes a requirement from a Hypixel guild.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to remove the requirement from.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to remove.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been removed from **{guild}**!

config guilds edit-requirement.name: edit-requirement
config guilds edit-requirement.description: Edits a requirement of a Hypixel guild.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild to edit the requirement of.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to edit.

options.name: value
options.description: The new value of the requirement.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
requirementNotFound: The requirement **{requirement}** does not exist in **{guild}**.
updatedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been set to **{value:,}** in **{guild}**!

config guilds add-rank-requirement.name: add-rank-requirement
config guilds add-rank-requirement.description: Adds a requirement to a Hypixel guild rank.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to add the requirement to.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to add.

options.name: value
options.description: The value of the requirement. Input any number for the 'API Settings Enabled' requirement.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The rank **{rank}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.
addedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been added to **{guild}**'s **{rank}** rank!

config guilds remove-rank-requirement.name: remove-rank-requirement
config guilds remove-rank-requirement.description: Removes a requirement from a Hypixel guild rank.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to remove the requirement from.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to remove.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
removedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been removed from **{guild}**'s **{rank}** rank!

config guilds edit-rank-requirement.name: edit-rank-requirement
config guilds edit-rank-requirement.description: Edits a requirement from a Hypixel guild rank.

options.name: guild
options.description: The guild that holds the rank.

options.name: rank
options.description: The rank to edit the requirement from.

options.name: requirement
options.description: The requirement to edit.

options.name: value
options.description: The value to set the requirement to.

guildNotAdded: The guild **{guild}** is not linked to this server.
rankNotFound: The rank **{rank}** does not exist in the **{guild}** guild.
updatedRequirement: The **{requirement}** requirement has been set to **{value}** for **{guild}**'s **{rank}** rank!

*.note: Catches all errors that aren't here.
message:
An unhandled error occured. This has been reported.

{e.__class__.__name__}: {e}

0.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid option is chosen.

1.note: Raised in config edit if an invalid value is chosen.
message: {value} is not a valid value for that option.

2.note: Raised if an un-assignable role is chosen and can't be used.
message: {role.mention} cannot be used because it's managed and cannot be assigned.

3.note: Raised when adding guilds if the guild already exists.
message: That guild has already been linked to this server.

4.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That guild has not been added to this server.

5.note: Raised when adding a guild rank that already exists.
message: That rank has already been linked to a role.

6.note: Raised when trying to edit a guild rank that doesnt exist in the database.
message: That rank has not been added to this server.

7.note: Raised when trying to add a guild requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this guild.

8.note: Raised when trying to manage a guild requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this guild.

9.note: Raised when trying to add a rank requirement that already exists in the database.
message: That requirement has already been added to this rank.

10.note: Raised when trying to manage a rank requirement that doesn't exist in the database.
message: That requirement has not been added to this rank.

11.note: Raised when the maximum value for a requirement is exceeded.
message: The maximum value of {maximum:,} for the {requirement} requirement has been exceeded.
